Class LoadDataFileTest

java.lang.Object
src.Test.LoadDataFileTest
class LoadDataFileTest extends Object
Unit tests for the LoadDataFile class. This class contains tests to verify the functionality of the LoadDataFile class.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test. Initializes the LoadDataFile instance.

    • testLoadJsonFromFile

      @Test public void testLoadJsonFromFile()
      Tests the loadJsonFromFile method. Verifies that the JSON object is loaded correctly from the file.

    • testSetJsonFileWithPath

      @Test public void testSetJsonFileWithPath()
      Tests the setJsonFile method with a file path. Verifies that the JSON object is set correctly from the file.

    • testSetJsonFileWithJsonObject

      @Test public void testSetJsonFileWithJsonObject()
      Tests the setJsonFile method with a JsonObject. Verifies that the JSON object is set correctly.

    • testGetGameDataObject

      @Test public void testGetGameDataObject()
      Tests the getGameDataObject method. Verifies that the correct JSON object is returned.

    • testGetGameDataFile

      @Test public void testGetGameDataFile()
      Tests the getGameDataFile method. Verifies that the correct file is returned.

    • testGetFilePath

      @Test public void testGetFilePath()
      Tests the getFilePath method. Verifies that the correct file path is returned.

    • testLoadJsonObjFromFile

      @Test public void testLoadJsonObjFromFile()
      Tests the loadJsonObjFromFile method. Verifies that the JSON object is loaded correctly from the file.

    • testSaveJsonObjToFile

      @Test public void testSaveJsonObjToFile()
      Tests the saveJsonObjToFile method. Verifies that the JSON object is saved correctly to the file.
